author: BE AMAZED
description:
Luxury cruise ships may look like places of relaxation and comfort , but when it comes to pirate attacks, they’re fully armed. From ear-splitting speakers, to high-powered water cannons – get ready as we dive into what happens when pirates attack a luxury cruise ship!  
Suggest a topic here to be turned into a video: http://bit.ly/2kwqhuh

title: Somali Pirates vs. High-Tech Luxury Cruise Defence
